dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-vcf-kit
dependent_to.description:
VCF-kit is a command-line based collection of utilities for performing
analysis on Variant Call Format (VCF) files.

dependent_to.name: py-adb-enhanced
dependent_to.description:
ADB-Enhanced is a Swiss-army knife for Android testing and development.
A command-line interface to trigger various scenarios like screen
rotation, battery saver mode, data saver mode, doze mode, permission
grant/revocation.

dependent_to.name: py-hdfs
dependent_to.description: API and command line interface for HDFS

dependent_to.name: py-stomp-py
dependent_to.description:
Python client library for accessing messaging servers (such as ActiveMQ,
Artemis or RabbitMQ) using the STOMP protocol (STOMP v1.0, STOMP v1.1
and STOMP v1.2)

dependent_to.name: py-pydap
dependent_to.description: An implementation of the Data Access Protocol.

dependent_to.name: py-colorclass
dependent_to.description:
Colorful worry-free console applications for Linux, Mac OS X, and
Windows.

dependent_to.name: py-pykwalify
dependent_to.description: Python lib/cli for JSON/YAML schema validation

dependent_to.name: py-num2words
dependent_to.description: Modules to convert numbers to words. Easily extensible.

dependent_to.name: py-coveralls
dependent_to.description: coveralls.io is a service for publishing your coverage stats online.
